#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
char a[100005];
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	getchar();
	while(t--)
	{


        gets(a);
        int l=strlen(a);
		for(int i=0;i<l;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]>='a' && a[i]<='z')
			{
				int j=a[i]-'a';
				cout<<j*j;
			}
			if(a[i]==' ')
			{

				cout<<"$";
				continue;
			}
			if(a[i+1]>='a' && a[i+1]<='z')
				cout<<"-";
		}
		cout<<"\n";
	}
}
/*
 *

 *
 */
